line.text: ' to access Enroll, Equipment and Expedition features'
'You cannot enroll more marines when at least '
' of them are already working for you'
'Enroll a new marine for 1 people, 1 Disruptor Rifle and '

line.comment: * We first need to initialize marines that have not been created by Mayhem. We also update marines location in case of an exchange in space.
* We check if the marine exists at the location if it's a ship.
* The marine is not in the ship (doesn't mean he's dead).

sval.val: to access Enroll, Equipment and Expedition features
You cannot enroll more marines when at least
of them are already working for you
Enroll a new marine for 1 people, 1 Disruptor Rifle and
We first need to initialize marines that have not been created by Mayhem. We also update marines location in case of an exchange in space.
We check if the marine exists at the location if it's a ship.
The marine is not in the ship (doesn't mean he's dead).
